term.title: eddy dispersion

item.text: The process by which substances are mixed in the atmosphere or in any fluid system due to eddy motion.

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2186 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
